name: Barium fluoride
desc: Barium fluoride (BaF2) is a chemical compound of barium and fluorine and is a salt. It is a solid which can be a transparent crystal. It occurs in nature as the mineral frankdicksonite.
Other anions:
Barium chloride
Barium bromide
Barium iodide
Other cations:
Beryllium fluoride
Magnesium fluoride
Calcium fluoride
Strontium fluoride
